src:
Zvezda zove: Požurite na blagajne, ima još karata za Totenhem
06 Nov 2019, 12:15 by Darko
Fudbaleri Crvene zvezde večeras dočekuju ekipu Totenhema u utakmici četvrtog kola Lige šampiona, a karata je ostalo još jako malo.
Do sada je prodato više karata u odnosu na meč sa Olimpijakosom, tako da se očekuje veći broj navijača na stadionu „Rajko Mitić“, saopštili su iz Crvene zvezde. Prema poslednjim informacijama za večerašnji susret ostalo je još oko 4.000 karata.
Utakmica između Zvezde i Totenhema počinje u 21 čas.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
The star is calling: Hurry to the cash registers, there are more tickets to Tottenham
06 Nov 2019, 11:15 by Darko
The Red Star football players welcome Tottenham tonight in the Champions League fourth round game, with only a few tickets left.
So far, more tickets have been sold compared to the Olympics, so more fans are expected at the Rajko Mitic stadium, Red Star officials said. According to the latest information, about 4,000 tickets remain for tonight's meeting.
The match between Zvezda and Tottenham starts at 9pm.
